Morning Star

Twin Headed Music Stand Light

Aug 20, 2013 • admin

As a musician, you need independently light your sheet music with two heads on one stand, then you can easily purchase the K and M twin headed music stand light at musician’s friend. It has the latest LED light technology that are bright and flexible, you can be used easily in just about any situation. The new attractive twin headed music stand light is well designed and fully adjustable goose-necks to cover sheet music pages. Musicians can use it and make your play as a comfortable one.
